thread.title: Train believed to be carrying North Korean delegation leaves Beijing

title: Train believed to be carrying North Korean delegation leaves Beijing
text:
Train believed to be carrying North Korean delegation leaves Beijing 6:21am EDT - 00:38 
A train rumored to be carrying a senior North Korean delegation leaves Beijing after a whirlwind visit to China's capital. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A train rumored to be carrying a senior North Korean delegation leaves Beijing after a whirlwind visit to China's capital. Rough cut (no reporter narration). Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2pLMTFx
